TouchEvent.Code:
onTouchEvent = function(event)
local phase = event.phase local target = event.target
if(phase == "began") then
elseif(phase == "moved") then
elseif(phase == "ended") then
end
return true end

GyroscopeEvent.Code:
onGyroscopeEvent = function(event)
local xRotation = event.xRotation local yRotation = event.yRotation local zRotation = event.zRotation local deltaTime = event.deltaTime
end

LocationEvent.Code:
onGPSEvent = function(event)
local accuracy = event.accuracy local altitude = event.altitude local direction = event.direction local errorCode = event.errorCode local errorMessage = event.errorMessage local latitude = event.latitude local longitude = event.longitude local speed = event.speed local time = event.time
end

KeyEvent.Code:
onKeyEvent = function(event)
local phase = event.phase local keyName = event.keyName
if(phase == "up")then
elseif(phase == "down") then
end
return true end

GlobalCollisionEvent.Code:
onGlobalCollisionEvent = function(event)
local phase = event.phase local object1 = event.object1 local object2 = event.object2 local element1 = event.element1 local element2 = event.element2 local x = event.x local y = event.y
if(phase == "began")then
elseif(phase == "ended") then
end
return true end

GlobalPostCollisionEvent.Code:
onGlobalPostCollisionEvent = function(event)
local object1 = event.object1 local object2 = event.object2 local element1 = event.element1 local element2 = event.element2 local x = event.x local y = event.y local friction = event.friction local force = event.force
return true end

LocalCollisionEvent.Code:
onLocalCollisionEvent = function(event)
local phase = event.phase local target = event.target local other = event.other local selfElement = event.selfElement local otherElement = event.otherElement local x = event.x local y = event.y
if(phase == "began")then
elseif(phase == "ended") then
end
return true end

local target = event.target local other = event.other local selfElement = event.selfElement local otherElement = event.otherElement local x = event.x local y = event.y local friction = event.friction local force = event.force

TapEvent.Code:
onTapEvent = function(event)
local numTaps = event.numTaps local x = event.x local y = event.y
end
